#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

char  p[100005];
int pie[100005], lt, lp;

void cal_pie()
{
    int k=0;
    pie[1]=0;
    for(int i=2;i<=lp;i++)
    {
        while(k>0 && p[k+1]!=p[i])
            k=pie[k];        //update on the basis that next string have same suffix which is before the last mismatch of the pattern
        if(p[k+1]==p[i])
            k++;
        pie[i]=k;
    }
}


int main()
{
    //freopen("read.in", "r", stdin);
    int test=1;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    for(int t=1;t<=test;t++)
    {
        scanf("%s",p+1);
        lp=strlen(p+1);
        cal_pie();
        if(pie[lp]==0)
        {
            printf("Case %d: -1\n", t);
        }
        else
        {
            printf("Case %d: %d\n", t, pie[lp]);
        }
    }
}
